title: Twisted Treeline?
body: Why is there no option for ranked 3v3 twisted treeline?

replies.body: such bullshit, heaps of people i play with love 3v3, and while we are on the topic what about dominion, heaps of people love dominion, summoner's rift is all well and good, but ARAM's are dumb, twisted treeline and dominion were way more fun, and i dont think that riot should have removed those gamemodes without at least doing or vote or something, we cant even play dominion or 3v3 against bots, i would really like for a Riot employee to respond to this and give us a legitimate reason for this, and not some cop-out pr reason because we can tell if it is RIOT, we arent stupid

Heaps of people wanted this when the OCE Region was announced but Riot said that we didn't have enough people to have 3v3 ranked.

I personally think this is ridiculous and we should have 3v3 and Twisted Tree Line open all the time, a lot of us OCE players used to play this back on US and now only have access to it for a few hours every week is just plain stupid.

I'm sure Riot understand many OCE players want 3v3 ranked and Twisted Tree Line open all the time but for now we must wait.
